Plot: An extremely pampered African Prince travels to Queens, New York, and goes undercover to find a wife whom he can respect for her intelligence and will.
Title: Coming to America
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 5 wins & 2 nominations.
Actors: Paul Bates, Eddie Murphy, Garcelle Beauvais, Feather
Writer: Eddie Murphy (story), David Sheffield (screenplay), Barry W. Blaustein (screenplay)
